mapper.insert: insert into tables_priv (Host, Db, User, Table_name, Grantor, Timestamp, Table_priv, Column_priv) values (#{host,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{db,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{user,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tableName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{grantor,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tablePriv,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{columnPriv,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select Host, Db, User, Table_name, Grantor, Timestamp, Table_priv, Column_priv from tables_priv
